snippet: “Ellsworth Kelly Plant Drawings,” at the Metropolitan Museum shows how figurative works have shaped the art of an abstract painter and sculptor.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews exhibition Ellsworth Kelly Plant Drawings at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Ellsworth Kelly Plant Drawings,” at the Metropolitan Museum shows how figurative works have shaped the art of an abstract painter and sculptor.

headline.seo: Ellsworth Kelly’s Plant Drawings at the Met
headline.main: Loving Flowers and Vines to Abstraction
